Title: Saint Seiya: Legend of Sanctuary
Writer: Masami Kurumada (manga), Chihiro Suzuki (screenplay), Tomohiro Suzuki
Actors: Kaito Ishikawa, Kenji Akabane, Kenshô Ono, Nobuhiko Okamoto
Plot: Warriors called "Saints" are the champions of hope who have always appeared since the Age of Myth whenever evil threatens the world. In this present day story, many years since the long ...
